short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a browser action showing which tabs are acive in a given window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you find yourself stuck with 25 tabs on a Google Chrome browser, not knowing which ones you need, sorting them alphabetically by URL (and therefore, by website name) makes it easier to sift through and figure out if a particular tab is still relevant or not.
